# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.egg

# Installer files
*.exe
*.msi
*.msix
*.msm
*.msp
*.iss

# Virtual environments
venv/
env/
ENV/

# IDE and Editor folders
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Logs and databases
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# User-specific files
*.swp
*.swo

# Ensure Resources directory is included
!Resources/
